body: It's more of a matriarchy than anything else. Biologically the only advantages men have are physical strength and lack of a uterus. And yes, natural talent determines nearly all of ability, whether people want to admit it or not. It sucks but it is what it is.

body: No, it's been proven that natural talent accounts for at least 75% of ability. And don't lie to me, being "talented" at anything outside of sports is seen as a feminine trait and always has been, everyone knows that. It's not without reason. Male simply is not supposed to have a rich, sophisticated inner world. We're designed to be warriors, workers, and sperm donors. That doesn't require much thought or even a "personal life" hardly at all. And yes it's natural talent, because it's due to observed brain differences; male and female brains are wired and built fundamentally differently, male for physio-spatial functions and female more well rounded and geared toward logic and creativity. Unfortunately for males, the second function is both the enjoyable one and the one that's not obsolete in modern life. Even worse, we get a mild taste of what we lost as before puberty the process of sacrificing everything to specialize in physio-spatial is not yet complete.
body_html: No, it's been proven that natural talent accounts for at least 75% of ability. And don't lie to me, being "talented" at anything outside of sports is seen as a feminine trait and always has been, everyone knows that. It's not without reason. Male simply is not supposed to have a rich, sophisticated inner world. We're designed to be warriors, workers, and sperm donors. That doesn't require much thought or even a "personal life" hardly at all. And yes it's natural talent, because it's due to observed brain differences; male and female brains are wired and built fundamentally differently, male for physio-spatial functions and female more well rounded and geared toward logic and creativity. Unfortunately for males, the second function is both the enjoyable one and the one that's not obsolete in modern life. Even worse, we get a mild taste of what we lost as before puberty the process of sacrificing everything to specialize in physio-spatial is not yet complete.
